description.zh: 本課程之目的係透過對文化之研究與解析，作為產品設計發展之元素，藉由設計專題之應用，開發出具文化意涵之商品，以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計之創新技能。
description.en: The aim of this course is via the research and analyze the culture, which to be the element of the development of product design. Through the application of design project to develop the cultural product. It could train the students the ability of analyzing the every cultures and the innovation skill of design.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹應用於寡數據狀態時的灰關聯分析模式，並針對此理論之數學及應用層面之領域提出看法，藉此使學生瞭解在無法用統計方法處理問題時之另一種解決方法。並適用於各種專業領域。1.複習線性代數----特徵值及特徵向量2.灰色理論簡介3.距離(norm)與正規化4.非標準化距離與集合距離5.關聯度的意義與灰關聯分析的程序6.主觀、客觀權重7.權重整合8.多變數分析與單變數分析9.與其他多評準決策方法的比較10.灰關聯分析的未來發展
description.en: this subject provides an introduction to the application of grey correlation analysis for multiple attributes. And, it will propose the view on the mathematic analysis with application. The students would understood that "it have an another non-statistic method to solved MADM problem". It will include the following objectives:"Review the linear algebra----eigenvalue and eigenvector."The introduction for Norm and normalization"Objective and Subjective Weighting factors"The integral for Weighting factors"The Analysis for multiple variable and single variable."Other multiple criteria decision methodologies"The future view for development of grey correlation analysis.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 中文課程概述： 本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程，假定他們未具生物學的背。生物程序是應用工程原理，來設計，發展以及採用生物催化劑來解析程序。這些程序可得很多結果，諸如生產期望化合物或分解破壞不要的有害的物質。工程的工具，尤其化學工程將會成功拓展生物程序所必須。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledges of bioprocessing to traditional chemical engineers. No background in biology is assumed. Biopocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze process using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The touls of the engineer, particularly the chemical engineer will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉末冶金學"的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。本課程偏重與大地工程相關之調查、規劃、設計、研究、分析、試驗等相關的案例討論。高等大地工程(一)主要課程單元包括:[1]基礎工程案例、[2]邊坡特性分類、[3]邊坡特性調查、[4]邊坡安定分析、[5]邊坡工程整治、[6]邊坡工程案例等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [I] consist of (1) Case studies of foundation problems, (2) Landslide Types, (3) Investigation of landslide features, (4) Stability analysis of slope, (5) Mitigation of unstable slope, (6) Engineering case studies.

name.en: Security and management of underground space

description.zh: 隨著人口的增加以及集中都市化的演進，利用地下空間已經是必然的趨勢，居住、商場、倉儲、交通、導排水等等，非但數量激增，甚且規模亦趨龐大。而地下空間因自然條件與進出、通路所限，無論維護、安全或管理都異於地面上的開放空間。台灣近年來的急遽發展，各類地下空間也急速增長，安全維護管理面更因人權的要求而益受關注。本課程即為因應此趨勢，而從地下空間的特異性開始，再以災害案例引入，尤其是以不確定性最高的公路隧道的火災消防搶救為主，整合土木、機電、營管、安全等不同領域知識，以貫串整學期的課程。內容簡述如下：一.地下空間之分類二.火災案例三.通風、照明系統簡介四.監控系統五.消防系統六.安全維護管理制度七.消防搶救本課程的目標在提供學生認知工程技術與營運管理及消防領域間整合性介面，引導學生從規劃設計階段即應思考人性化營運管理思維，成為全方位之未來工程師。
description.en: As the increasing number of population are living in the big cities, housing, shopping malls, warehousing, transportation, water supply and drainage are growing rapidly both in the number and the scale.  Therefore, the use of underground space is an inevitable trend.   Due to natural conditions and limited access of underground space, maintenance, security and management of underground space are quite different from those of open space on the ground.  With Taiwan's rapid development in recent years, various types of underground space are sprawling. Security, maintenance and management of underground space are of concern to us all. The course for this semester begins with exploring  the uniqueness of underground space, then studying several disaster cases focusing on the fire rescue for road tunnels and ends with integrating different areas of knowledge such as civil engineering, mechanical engineering, management and tunnel safety.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解管理會計的技巧與成本管理的觀念。在介紹過營收報表、損益平衡表、現金流動表後，本課程將探討資產管理、資金結構、資金運轉、創投資金、股息策略、利潤分析等議題。課程中亦將論及利用這些財務數據做為決策根據的作法。
description.en: This course teaches students the conceptual understanding of managerial accounting skills and cost management. After the introduction of income statement, balance sheet, cash flow statement, this course will examine the topics that include asset management, capital structure, capital budgeting, venture capital, dividend policy, profit analysis, etc. The use of these financial data towards decision-making will be evaluated and discussed.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容:工業組織、人事管理、工廠規劃、成本分析與控制、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

notes: 新工管所長邀請工管各老師授課 / 科研825教室

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 時序進入Web 2.0時代，網路行銷已不再停留在發e-mail而已了為了破除這個迷思，本課程嘗試從Web 2.0的思維，以「個案」、「實務」二個導向為主要設計，將傳統行銷與新的網路行銷做一整合，從概念、理論、實務、到重要議題詳細闡述網路行銷的各個面貌。並介紹現今網路行銷重點議題，以簡單易懂的觀念與案例，一步步引導進入網路行銷的世界。 本課程探討一對一行銷與網路廣告、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、網路金流機制、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，一對一行銷，行動商務之網路行銷、網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路行銷實務規劃之能力。
description.en: The Internet is becoming an important way to market your products and services. As a business owner, it is essential to understand the benefits of marketing on the Internet and the different options and technologies available. Simply having a web presence is not enough. Creating a website for your company is only the first step.Increasing usage of the Internet reduces traditional media's effectiveness as people give up their time for other activities such as watching TV and reading newspapers or magazines to the Internet.1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新" 研發流程管理以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，研發與管理思維更要突破創新，以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。創新研發管理課程;以詳細介紹產品與服務研發流程與組織架構、產品與服務策略與規劃、確認與掌握客戶需求、產品與服務規格定義與確認、產品與服務概念開發與測試、品質與目標成本設計、產品研發流程之突破創新機會點(前端預防設計)、解決問題之創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)等主題。瞭解TRIZ如何應用於系統化創新構思並解?矛盾問題，快速激發最可能解?指定問題之TRIZ創新原則與指導方向，解?之問題包含工程與管理策略亦適用，TRIZ管理實務案例包含研發管理、生產管理、服務業管理、專案管理。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in an innovative thinking manner for product R&D management process, including product planning, concept development, system design, detail design, testing and refinement, and ramp-up production. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 12 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, project management, service industry management, and production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students involving creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解管理會計的技巧與成本管理的觀念。在介紹過營收報表、損益平衡表、現金流動表後，本課程將探討資產管理、資金結構、資金運轉、創投資金、股息策略、利潤分析等議題。課程中亦將論及利用這些財務數據做為決策根據的作法。
description.en: This course teaches students the conceptual understanding of managerial accounting skills and cost management. After the introduction of income statement, balance sheet, cash flow statement, this course will examine the topics that include asset management, capital structure, capital budgeting, venture capital, dividend policy, profit analysis, etc. The use of these financial data towards decision-making will be evaluated and discussed.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程期透過建立學生正確的研究觀念，以培養論文研究與寫作之基礎能力。根據論文寫作方法之需求，分別從建立正確的研究態度、質性研究、探索性研究設計、研究個案探討、論文格式及研究程序加以研討，讓學生了解研究方法的本質、研究的意義、過程與方法，以及研究設計的基本概念與特性；進而瞭解如何進行質性與量化研究、資料蒐集、資料處理與統計分析，並管理研究的設計與執行程序。此外，藉由本課程促使學生能應用各種不同的統計方法及統計軟體以分析商管領域等相關資料，學習撰寫研究論文並準備口頭報告，以培養商業管理研究論文之撰寫、闡釋、解讀並評析各式研究報告的能力。
description.en: The objectives of this course are：1. To introduce the basic concept of research methodology that applies in academic and practical research. 2. To learn the methods of conducting research processes, designing research strategies, collecting and analyzing research data, and preparing research proposals and reports. 3. To know how to obtain the required information through appropriate approaches in writing research papers and solving management problems.

description.zh: 課程主要內容如下; 1.創業前的主要功課,產業分析鎖定及環境scan 2.創業的成功失敗因素分析 3.創業前的SWOT分析 4.創業專業知識->財務規劃及理財篇 5.創業專業知識->行銷管理篇 6.創業專業知識->資訊管理篇 7.創業專業知識->生產管理及產品研發 8.創業專業知識->人力資源及組織規劃 9.企業營運計畫書撰寫 10.企業營運財務試算 11.企業創業實務篇->加盟連鎖管理(1)--(8) 12.企業創業實務篇->個店經營管理(1)-(2)
description.en: The main content of this course include: 1. Environmental analysis. 2. The key factor to successfully start an enterprise. 3. SWOT analysis. 4. Financial forecast and financial management. 5. Marketing management. 6. Informational management. 7. Manufacturing management and new product design. 8. Human resources and organization management. 9. Start-an-enterprise operating program. 10.The try-balance-sheet of starting an enterprise. 11.Case study of a famous successful joined-ventured company. 12.Case study of a famous successful new-factional enterprise.

description.zh: 以營利模式方法對企業，產業進行分析。研究宏觀經濟與企業生存的關係，以個案或個別產業為例深入研究。將研究結果應用於企業管理與投資。
description.en: Application of profit model's analytical tool to analyze an enterprise in depth. The same method is also applied to analyze an industrial sector. The objectives are to help a business in business decision making in order to improve its profitability.

description.zh: 本課程透過課堂演講，以講授最新管理知識或各產業之最新熱門管理議題，並透過學生分組研討使學生進一步瞭解經營管理的最新發展與趨勢。
description.en: This course focuses on lecturing, seminar, group study, and training of students' broad vision about the newly development and future trend of business management.

notes: 林淑玲老師邀請經管各老師授課 / 科研732教室

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬與合金凝固之基本理論以及它的應用與控制,由熱流動,質量傳輸以及成核與晶体成長來討論凝固機制。
description.en: The course of solidification principles dealing with the fundamentals of metal and alloy solidification and how to relate these fundamentals to practice and control. Based upon the fundamentals of heat flow mass transport and nucleation crystal growth to discuss about solidification mechanisms. This course is suitable for senior-level and graduate students.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理、工科學生作為研習管理的入門課程，內容大體上包括有管理的基本理論、管理資訊系統、破壞性技術對傳統挑戰的挑戰、科技法律概念、科技發展的佈雷區與迴避設計、網路知識管理、個案討論等等。在今天快速變動與競爭激烈的經營環境中，屬於無形資產之一的科學技術往往被認為是企業最不容易評估以及最不容易管理的課題，從歷史眼光看，大凡一家公司能夠將本身的技術管理的好並且能即時掌握競爭對手的最新技術動態，通常多能成就一番非凡事業。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary management study for graduate school students majoring in science and engineering. It is focused on issues related to: Fundamental Principles of Management, Management Information System, The Challenge of Disruptive Technologies to Tradition, The Concept of Technology Law, Forbidden-Area and Design -Around of Research & Development, Networking Knowledge Management and Case Discussions,etc.In today's fast moving and keenly competitive management environment, the evaluation and management of the scientific technology, one of the intangible assets, have been considered the ultimately difficult issues in every business enterprise. From the viewpoint of history, provided that an enterprise not only can properly manage their own technology but also can get the latest information of their competitors' technologies, it would always accomplish notable achievements.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

notes: 綜科417思源講堂;車輛所和電機所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.en: 1. Mathematical background2. Lyapunov stability3. Lyapunov method4. LaSalle's theorem and Barbalat's lemma5. Stability analysis of Lagrange systems6. Stability analysis of time-delay systems

description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micre CMOS device,characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative hpysical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 本課程介紹固體，尤其是半導體的光學性質，目的在了解光學檢測及光電元件的基礎原理。 藉由學習電磁波與半導體的交互作用，一方面可了解光在半導體中的產生、傳播、吸收、散射、及在界面的透射與反射等現象的規律，另一方面亦可認識光學特性與能帶結構、聲子結構、束縛與自由電子、及各種激發態之間的關係。課程內容包含固態物理複習、光學特性簡介、古典模型、帶間躍遷、激子、螢光現象、半導體低維系統的光學性質、自由載子及缺陷的光學性質、聲子相關特性、非線性光學性質等。
description.en: This course introduces the optical properties of solids, mainly semiconductors. The fundamental principles of absorption, reflection, luminescence and light scattering will be illustrated in terms of classical and quantum theories as appropriate. It mainly includes (1) Introduction (2) Classical propagation (3) Interband absorption (4) Excitons (5) Luminescence (6) Low-dimensional systems of semiconductors (7) Free electrons (8) Luminescence centers (9) Phonons (10)Nonlinear properties.

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生個人軟體程序的概念與技術，幫助學生建立相關的技能以提升其開發軟體的能力。透過原理與實作的結合，引導學生學習軟體專案計畫、追蹤、測量、與分析等方法，並學習如何使用這些方法來改善個人軟體開發的效能。課程內容包括下列主題：一、個人軟體程序策略二、個人軟體程序基準三、計劃I - 計劃的流程四、計劃II - 軟體規模測量五、計劃III - 軟體規模估算六、計劃IV - 資源與時程估算七、個人軟體程序測量八、設計與程式碼檢驗九、個人軟體程序擴展十、個人軟體程序應用
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	The objective of this course is to introduce the concepts and technologies of personal software process and help students build the skills required for doing better development work. In particular, students will learn comprehensive planning, tracking, measuring, and analysis methods and learn how to use these techniques to improve their personal performance in developing software projects. The course will cover the following topics: 1.The Personal Software Process Strategy 2.The Baseline Personal Process 3.Planning I - The Planning Process 4.Planning II - Measuring Software Size 5.Planning III - Estimating Software Size 6.Planning IV - Resources and Schedules Estimating7.Measurements in the Personal Software Process 8.Design and Code Reviews9.Scaling Up the Personal Software Process10.Using the Personal Software Process

description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

name.zh: 雲端運算之應用與服務
name.en: Applications and Services of Cloud Computing

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，因而顧客可隨時取用Web化的網路資源、軟體或資料。實際上，雲端運算 (Cloud Computing)是新一代的網際網路服務以及新一代的資料中心。本課程的主要內容包含網路基礎(含TCP/IP)、Client/Server和Intranet計算、雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算的核心技術、多人租用控制、雲端運算的服務模式、雲端運算應用架構、雲端運算的安全/私密/信任管理議題、雲端運算的發展策略以及結論。此外，本課程亦選擇一些有關雲端運算的期刊論文指定予同學研讀並於課堂上簡報和討論之。總之，本課程的教學目標是為了能讓同學完全瞭解最新的雲端運算之技術趨勢、應用發展以及服務管理。
description.en: Cloud Computing is a new model for enabling convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources that can be rapidly provisioned and released with minimal management effort or service provider interaction. Practically, Cloud Computing is new frontier of Internet Computing and next generation Data Centers. This course covers Networking Fundamentals (including TCP/IP); Client/Server and Intranet Computing; Cloud Computing: An Overview; Core Technologies of Cloud Computing; Cloud Service Models; Multi-tenancy Control, Cloud Application Architecture: Hadoop: HDFS, Hbase, MapReduce; Security, Privacy and Trust Management Issues for Cloud Computing; Developing Strategies in Cloud Computing; and Conclusion. In summary, the teaching goal of this course is to provide students with the full understanding in technologies trend, applications development, and services management of Cloud Computing.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是提供修課者對多變量方法的理論了解與軟體工具，作為協助專業計畫或論文研究有關於多變量資料的分析。本課程內容為Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Principal Components, Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Clustering 等。課程內容除了理論介紹外，期刊論文應用的例子是本課程教材的另一特色。成績以專案報告、期中、期末考為評分依據。

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm, such as Backpropagation, probability ANN, Counter-propagation, self-organization map. Hopfield network, BAN etc. Besides, the relative literature and applications will also cover.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

description.zh: 本單元介紹台灣當紅的數位藝術潮流，並從生活面來思考，廣義的數位藝術，正如何影響我們的生活經驗。近三十年來，隨著數位科技全面改變我們的生活方式，數位藝術在國內外也逐漸受到重視，成為一種不可忽視的藝術形態。不止在純藝術方面帶來衝擊，在設計、影視、廣告等各種應用藝術的相關領域，更是帶來生產方式的全面革新，甚至是思考方式的改變。自古以來，藝術家就不停地探索適合創作的新媒材，數位科技的便利，在藝術家眼中，是另一種全新的可能性。課程含數位美學，美學可分為兩種一維螢幕內的東西如介面motion graphic, user interface, orientation.；另一為產品或裝置在環境、燈光、機械等的應用。
description.en: This course is an attempt to introduce the most popular digital art trend and to reflect upon how the digital art in general is affecting our life experiences at the present time. In the recent thirty years, the advance of technology has entirely changed our lifestyle. Digital art has gained much attention and become a trend of art which can not be unheeded. It has an impact not only on fine arts but also on fields related to art, such as design, film and video, and advertisement. Furthermore, digital art brought about a revolutionized change of production as much as thinking. Artists have always been looking for new media for creation, and the convenience of digital technology will be a whole new possibility in the perspective. name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 水文遙測主要之目的為藉由衛星及飛機等的儀器收集地表對不同波長之反射特性，並加以分析，因此可用於國土監測及防災等。藉由波長反射的特性可率訂所需的參數，將可用於大尺度的模擬，如地表能量平衡、地表水文、土地利用、植物指標、地表溫度、輻射通量及地表土壤濕度等。
description.en: Observations by instruments on board satellites provide data on radiative characteristics of the earth's surface at various wavelengths.  From these characteristics, one may determine parameters of interest for large-scale modeling of the earth's energy balance and surface hydrology, for instance land use, vegetation indices, surface temperature, radiative fluxes, and surface soil moisture.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。

By the subjects         analysis, reports and discussion, students can          improve their abilities of understanding the         construction management domain, and thinking of         similar subjects they may have later.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述:(I) 高分子之非結晶性質(a) 高分子鏈之機率結構(b) 分子鏈之運動方式(c) 高分子熱力學(d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討)(e) WLF經通曲線(II)高分子之結晶性質(a) 結晶晶格之分析(b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計(c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響(d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較(e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

name.zh: 進階逐步與同步口譯專業實務

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生中英逐步口譯及會議同步口譯技巧，透過完整專業訓練及密集實務演練，學生所學將可運用於實際企業內口譯、隨行口譯及國際會議口譯。第一階段透過密集演練進階視譯、逐步口譯筆記、記憶分析，學生深化英文理解與口譯之表達能力，學習口譯中傳意不傳詞之精髓。第二階段進入同步口譯教程，學生將認識會議同步口譯之多重任務特質，並將斷句、倒譯、增補、糾正與歸納等同步技巧，運用於實際會議演說之口譯。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to in-house interpreting, escort interpreting and conference interpreting. Students are familiarized with advanced strategies and techniques in both the consecutive and simultaneous mode of interpreting. Intensive training in sight translation, note-taking and memory retention seek to promote students' listening comprehension and facilitate consecutive interpreting. In simultaneous interpreting sessions, students learn the multitasking nature of the profession and the concept of processing capacity. Practical coping tactics including segmentation, conversion, amplification/omission, correction and induction are also put into practice in interpreting authentic speeches.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

name.zh: 公共戶外家具設計研究

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 家具設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved furniture design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 德國設計研究與體驗(一)
name.en: Design Research and Experience in Germany (I)

description.zh: 赴德研習之準備課程；創新設計實務與文化相關之研究，以建立德國設計研究與體驗基礎。課程內容以調查研究德國設計相關設計資源﹐包含學校﹐設計展﹐博物館﹐文化及語言等內容。
description.en: This course provides research of design in Germany related topics on culture and Design. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and experiential verification.

description.zh: 課程以人因研究為基礎，分為四個階段：文獻資料收集與分析、人因實驗、創新設計、使用者受測評估實驗。透過系統化人因研究與應用設計之步驟與流程，帶領學生了解人因研究之實驗方法，啟發人本設計概念。
description.en: The course is based on ergonomic. There are four stages: literature review, ergonomic experiment, creative design and evaluation. Students will learn the scientific research method in ergonomic through step by step process.

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2.電力電子元件特性 3.元件與電路佈局4.元件特性與雜訊 5.元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 一.電力設備的故障二.比壓器,比流器三.保護電驛的構造及動作原理四.常用的保護電驛五.發電機與電動機的保護六.變壓器的保護七.線路保護八.異常電壓的預防九.熔絲十.保護協調
description.en: <一>INTRODUCTION<二>WHAT REALLY IS THE MVA METHOD<三>THE ABC OF THE MVA<四>WHY THE MVA METHOD<五>COMPARISON OF THREE METHODS<六>CAN PHASE-GROUND FAULT BE SOLVED <七>MVA METHODS FOR INSTANTANEOUS VOLTAGE ESTIMATE<八>THE SIMPLE COMPUTER TIME SHARE PROGRAM<九>CONCLUSION

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。 本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程講授如何使用Westlaw International資料庫進行IP研究。主要的專利資料庫的檢索方式也會展示。在每堂課前，學生必須要閱讀教材。課堂參與是必須的。其他資訊請見英文課程摘要。
description.en: This course is intended to expose students to various research skills for studying IP issues. Primarily, this course teaches how to use the Westlaw International database to do IP research. The framework of the database is based on the legal research methodology applied to American law. So, the basic knowledge of the American legal research methodology will be introduced. In addition, this course will demonstrate major patent databases to students. Students will be assgined to one research project. Students are required to study reading materials before each class. Class participation is also required.

description.zh: 本課程講授與專利寫作有關的法律理論和法律或法規。本課程重點在於美國實務。但是，為了比較的目的，歐洲、臺灣和中國的實務也會涵蓋在本課程內。學生將被要求閱讀法院判決。修課學生不需要有技術背景。課堂參與也是必要的。可能會有書面作業，以練習專利寫作。
description.en: This course teaches a variety of legal doctrines and laws or regulations regarding patent drafting. Primarily, this course focuses on American practices. But, European, Taiwan and China practices are also covered for comparison purposes. Students will be assigned to read court decisions. Technical backgrounds are not required for taking this course. Class participation is also required. Writing assignments regarding patent drafting might be given.

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下：1.專利權利項解讀2.專利侵權分析流程3.專利迴避設計要件4.專利策略分析5.專利佈局實務6.案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around.  In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies.  However, in practice, they perform much less.  That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty.  This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies.  The outline of this course is given as follows:Patent claim interpretation;Process of patent infringement analysis;Requirements of patent design around;Patent strategy analysis;Practice on patent strategies; andStudy on patent cases.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹美國專利制度與美國專利法。由於美國為案例法國家，故除介紹美國專利法之35 U.S.C. §§101-103 and §112等重要法規外，並以相關case law說明美國專利法的實質內涵與精神。修習本課程之學生，於逐步學習到閱讀法律英文之方法後，期於完成本課程時，具有獨力閱讀美國專利案例之能力。
description.en: This course will introduce the U.S. Patent Act and cases, including 35 U.S.C. §101-103, 112, as well as the patent system. Students are expected to read assignments before the class, so that they can answer questions and join discussions in class. Students are expected to learn how to read legal English durning the course and able to read patent cases on their own.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

notes: 蕭玉真、阮啟殷、施立成老師

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 網際網路牽涉許多的法律爭議與問題，主要原因在於網際網路環境與一般傳統日常活動不同；而且網路的技術發展迅速，網路上新興的活動呈現多樣與多變之性質，亦使傳統法律無法應付層出不窮的網路行為。本課程除將探討一般網路法律之規定外，並將引領學生針對現今爭議的問題，應適用何種法律或應新增訂、或修訂法律，作深入探討。期使學生於本課程中，除了解到一般網路法律外，對於新的網路議題，應能夠作相關的分析與探討。
description.en: In the information age many legal issues related to the Internet result from the differences between the Internet and conventional activities. Compared with the conventional activities, the nature of activities on the Internet is changing more rapidly and more diversely. In this course I would like to introduce some important issues of cyberlaw and some current issues as well. Students will learn some relevant regulations of cyberlaw and have the abilities to analyze the new legal issues on the Internet in the end.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用以發展與分析三維空間多體運動學與動力學的觀念, 定義, 與技巧. 主要課題包括計算動力學簡介, 剛體運動學, 動態方程的構成, 侷限動力學與空間動力學等.
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, definitions, and techniques used for developing and analyzing kinematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics. ematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics.

description.zh: 本課程內容主要包括核能電廠系統熱流、結構應力與安全分析、量化風險評估(PRA)兩主要部份：系統熱流、結構應力與安全分析內容主要包括核反應器系統描述，流體系統分析，核反應器熱的產生與熱流學，核能電廠熱水力學，應力分析。透過PRA技術可全面檢討核能電廠潛在弱點，該部分的內容包括PRA技術在核能電廠系統、風險管制、用過核燃料處置等之應用。
description.en: This lecture will mainly covers the thermal-hydraulics, structure stress & safety analysis, and the modern methods for probabilistic and risk assessment (PRA) for nuclear power plants (NPPs).Thermal hydraulics, structure stress & safety analysis will cover: description of nuclear power systems; fluid flow system, thermal and structural analysis of reactor core and plant components; thermal-hydraulic analysis of accidents in nuclear power plants.The weakness of nuclear power plants can be identified through the PRA technology. Content of PRA will cover basic concept of probability, applications to the reliability assessment of components, event-tree and fault-tree analysis, uncertainty analysis and its propagation, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。探討：專利有效性法規、專利案例閱讀與分析、專利侵害鑑定要點、專利侵權鑑定實務、專利迴避性設計、智財法院審理模式、智財審理法。
description.en: Discussing the patent act, patent infringement analysis, and patent identification. The course includes: patent act about patent validity, patent cases analysis, patent infringement identification guide, patent infringement identification practice, patent design around, intellectual property court trial mode, and intellectual property case adjudication act.

notes: 機電所和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

notes: 乙組 6選2 機電所和製科所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制、電氣控制、數值控制、幾何數據處理、驅動系統、適應控制系統、監視系統與診斷系統、機器人控制、電腦整合精密機械系統。
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, and Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開,製科所12選3,限20人

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.en: The Study of Design Business Management(I)

description.zh: 設計事業管理的重要性與複雜性並不低於一般事業機構，但多數設計事業經營者並未受過正規事業管理訓練，因而或遭遇經營上的困難，或無法在事業經營領域有長足的表現。設計事業管理研究（一）重點可分為：1. 設計事業本質之探討； 2. 設計溝通；3. 設計市場學。透過良好的事業管理，設計業者可望為客戶提供更好的產品與服務；創造更好的利潤並有助於整體設計事業界之提升。
description.en: The management of design business is no less important and complex than any business but most designers or design practitioners seemed unfamiliar with this field; therefore, might have experienced difficulties while running the design firm. This study involves exploring: 1. the essence of the design profession; 2. effective design communication; 3. design marketing. Excellent performance of design business management leads to good design products/services; it leads also better profit to the design practitioner and the overall benefit to the design profession.

description.zh: 通用設計專題在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足各種各樣的使用者需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認詮釋性設計思維方法與實務。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 1.橋樑結構分析2.RC橋設計3.規範闡釋

description.en: This course is concerned with the design and applications of high resolution camera, which includes the basic various characteristics of image sensors, analog and digital processes, and some applications of high resolution camera. Its purpose is to deal with the design and applications of high resolution camera, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1 Introduction to CCD/CMOS Sensors, 2 The Characteristics of Image Sensors, 3 Introduction of Color Image Sciences, 4 Sensor Raw Data of Analog Front End Processing (AFE), 5 Digital Image Signal Processing (ISP), 6 Evaluation of DSP and FPGA Hardware Platforms, 7 Image Quality Evaluation, 8 Applications of Medical Image System, 9 Applications of Full-High-Definition IP-Camera, and 10 Machine Vision Applications.

description.zh: 本課程包含2大部份，服務與創新管理及智慧財產權與科技法律。服務與創新管理旨在了解服務與創新管理之意義、方法與現況，內容包含服務之本質、創新之意義、服務與創新管理之方法、科技之應用、服務與創新管理現況介紹等。智慧財產權與科技法律旨在了解如何以智慧財產權來保護科技研發成果，內容包括智慧財產權法規介紹與專利運用策略實務。
description.en: This course contains two major parts, service and innovation management and Intellectual property and technology law. Service and innovation management is to demonstrate the definition, the methodologies and the state of the art of service and innovation management, including the nature of service, innovation, the tools for service and innovation management, technology application and current development of service and innovation management. Intellectual property and technology law is to demonstrate understanding how to protect R & D achievements with intellectual property rights. This course includes intellectual property laws and patent strategies practice.

The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.
