description.zh: 1.電腦通訊網路簡介 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換技術 4.流量與壅塞控制 5.介質存取控制機制 6.區域網路 7.網路互連技術 8.無線網路 9.高速網路
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Communication Networks 2.Layered Structure 3.Routing and Switching Techniques 4.Flow and Congestion Control 5.Medium Access Control Mechanism  6. Local Area Networks 7. Network Interconnection 8. Wireless Networks 9. High Speed Networks

description.zh: 本課程將介紹電腦多媒體系統的發展。不同的媒體種類的處理以及相關的技術與概念，將在本課程中作介紹。其中包括電腦圖學，電腦動畫，電腦聲音與音樂，以及電腦視訊。商用的多媒體系統，以及研究階段的多媒體作家系統，也將涵蓋在課程的範圍之中。對多媒體的現今技術與未來，作系統性的討論與說明。課程大綱:多媒體系統簡介，多媒體市場，多媒體套裝，基本媒體--聲音，視訊，影像，動畫，文字；整合環境與套裝--書頁模式，連結模式，邏輯編排模式，展示模式；未來趨勢。
description.en: This course will look the multimedia development in computer science domain. Various media, such sound, video, graphic and animation, will be examined first to illustrate their usage in a computerized environment. Commercial packages will be employed to exercise the multimedia application in selected areas thereafter. Course Outline: Introduction to Multimedia; Multimedia Market; Multimedia Production Packages; Basic Media (Basics & Hardware/Software) - Audio, Video, Image, Animation, Text; Composition Environment/Packages -- Page-Oriented, Node-Link Oriented, Scripting, Demonstration; Future Trend.

description.zh: 本課程介紹科技論文寫作與報告，課程內容包括科技論文寫作元素介紹(摘要、介紹、方法、結果、討論、結論)與撰寫方式，文獻搜尋與整理，報告與發表注意事項，以利環境所碩博士生應用於未來論文撰寫與成果發表。
description.en: This class focuses on the Introduction of major elements in technical writing, including abstract, introduction, research methods, results, discussion, and conclusion. Writing grammar, style, and methods to perform literature search and review are also introduced. The main aim of this course is enhancing the ability of graduate students in future thesis writing and research publication.

name.zh: 進階家具與室內設計(一)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Furniture and Interior Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 材料光學與技術含實習
name.en: Photophysic Science and Technology II: Practical Technology

description.zh: 白光LED在照明領域的應用愈來愈廣泛，不僅在顯示器及影像的應用上，又如結合螢光與太陽能電池之應用也值得重視討論，因此本堂課除將介紹相關資訊在課程中，並針對學生所提相關問題做指導。
description.en: The progress of the field of lighting using w-LEDs is remarkable. Moreover, the progress of not only displays but also imaging is also considerable. Combination of luminescence and solar cells is also noticed. Therefore, I would like to introduce hot news concerning photophysics in my lecture.Moreover, I will guide for proposals and questions from staffs and students to contribute the progress of Optoelectronic Department of NTUT.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 本課程檢視受到廣泛使用的主要教育評鑑模式，並熟悉教育評鑑模式的取向與實用技術。
description.en: This course is designed to review the most widely used model for educational evaluation, to conversant with approach and utility technique of evaluation models.

name.en: Instructional Strategies for Technical- Vocational Education

description.zh: 身為一名專業教師，應對教學策略有深刻的瞭解，方能詳細考慮各項條件﹑採取適切的教學策略，提昇教學的成效。本課程之開設，即在使學習者熟悉教學策略的意義﹑教學策略的類型，提昇教學相關理念，並進一步應用所學，反思個人的教學，促進教學理論與教學實踐間的連結。
description.en: The course is designed to make the graduate understand the basic concept of instruction, to realize the various strategies for instruction in technical-vocational education, and to know how to apply and evaluate the strategies.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

name.zh: 小說起源與十八世紀小說
name.en: Rise of the Novel and Eighteenth-Century Works

description.zh: 十八世紀小說的興起讓文學歷史進入了一個新的時代。有別於以往的文學作品與作家，十八世紀小說家以更"寫實"的角度表達他們對於社會的關懷。本課程旨在探討十八世紀小說文類的發展，並以Daniel Defoe, Henry Fielding以及Samuel Richardson等重要小說家的作品為探討重心，除了文本的研究之外，並輔以理論解析，以期幫助學生對於寫實小說之起源有更深入的了解。本課程將閱讀的文類包含小說、散文以及政論小冊，在文本閱讀以外，促使十八世紀小說興起的文化背景亦會是課程重點之一。
description.en: Justification:The rise of the novel in the eighteenth century introduced a new era in literary history. Different from the authors / literary works in the past, eighteenth-century writers tried to express their concerns of the society in more "realistic" ways. This course aims to examine the development of the genre with the focus on the works of eighteenth-century important novelists: Daniel Defoe, Henry Fielding, and Samuel Richardson. The emphasis of the course will be a direct investigation of literary texts along with theoretical interpretations. The hope is to help the students further their knowledge about realistic novel/narrative at its source.Methodology: Texts to be studied include novels, prose and pamphlet essays. In addition to the texts, students will be expected to learn more about cultural and contextual issues that influenced the emergence of the novel.

name.zh: 文學與批判理論應用專題
name.en: Special Topic in Literary and Critical Theory

description.zh: 課程旨在以跨領域的思考方法，融合文學與批判理論，探討特定主題如何在作品中呈現，思考在不同文化背景和歷史脈絡中的意義，以訓練學生運用和整合在其他學科，甚至其他學術領域學到的能力：諸如藝術和文學風格，社會和哲學思潮等。透過對文本（文學、電影、和其他藝術領域）的細讀和理論的思考和運用，學生可進一步應用跨領域專題研究的方法。可能的專題包括：文學與復仇文化、文學與音樂、電影中的愛與慾、文學與哲學等。
description.en: This course focuses on a chosen theme in literary and cultural studies, aiming to train our graduate's ability to investigate, both textually and theoretically, a theme in cultural productions in a comparative mode. Integrating the knowledge and insights students have acquired in other courses on artistic styles, social, and philosophical treads in a given period, this course approaches literature comparatively. In the process of examining what a particular theme means across history, students should acquire techniques important throughout their postgraduate studies. Possible themes include: Literature and Revenge, Literature and Music, Love and Desire in Cinema, Literature and Philosophy, etc.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究. 有關科技開發案之技術開發管理, 人力責任管理及時間任務管理等PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action)之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制，數值控制，幾何資料處理，進給驅動器，NC機器的位置量測系統，自動化加工的機器監視與診斷，電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

notes: 技術組/管理組  限25人

description.zh: 城市是有機體，是文明的象徵，更是文化薈萃的結點，因此城市的文化內涵、生活百態、環境紋理、經濟發展、社會互動與城市治理及發展規劃息息相關。經由實證研究得知城市轉型是是國家現代化過程中的必然現象與必須面對的問題，亦即如何由傳統社會走向現代化社會、從農業社會走向資訊化社會、從封閉型社會走向開放型社會的變遷和文化發展的挑戰。這些挑戰與城市文化內涵、產業經濟空間規劃及都市治理模式息息相關。先進國家常以創意城市作為城市再生與轉型的契機，藉由城市再生的整體創意與創新策略，將產業創新與文化創意作為環境再造、產業再結構、治理機制調適、公共設施服務與社會活力的內涵，藉以振興產業及強化競爭力。本課程以產業創新及城市創意為主軸，內容將包括研究創意城市的理論與實務，如定義、特徵、條件、構成、指標、類型、評估的基礎認識，進而探討與產業創新、城市發展規劃的關連，並參考國內外案例，研析其優缺點及自省我們的境況與條件，最後經由課程互動，研討可供我們借鏡的可能方向與作法。
description.en: The city is an organism, a symbol of civilization and the cultural nodes. Thus the city's cultural connotations, life styles, environmental textures, economic development, social interaction, which are closely related to urban governance and development planning. Through empirical research, urban transformation is an inevitable phenomenon in the country's modernization process. That is challenges from a traditional society to modern society, from an agricultural society to an information society, from the closed society towards an open society, which are closely related to urban culture, spatial planning of industrial economy and urban governance.For some advanced countries, they have been trying to reach creative cities as the opportunities of urban regenerations and transformations. They aim to revive the industry and strengthen competitiveness by the way of overall creativity and innovation strategies of urban regeneration, environmental improvement, industrial restructuring, the

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: The material in this course covers implantable, nonimplantable, and extracorporeal materials. Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程著重於如何將研究成果轉化成有市場價值的商品，使企業增加競爭優勢的過程。研究成果商品化是一長期且複雜的過程，需要研究創新、產品商業化、市場潛力評估、顧客行為分析與行銷策略等面向，才能確保商品化過程的順利進行，課程將說明商品化過程中所面臨的挑戰與可採行策略，在構想階段就可以評估商品的市場價值，如何設計行銷組合，說明研究成果商品化發展與上市過程與策略。
description.en: This course is original of research results transform into marketable products. And it wants to increase the competitive advantage of business. The commercialization of  research results is a long and complex process. The course explain the commercialization process will face the challenges and the strategies being adopted. In the conceptual stage to  assess the market value of commodities, as well as how to design marketing strategy and mix, the commercialization of research results development and listing process and strategy.

notes: 電機所、電通所、資工所、光電所合開

description.zh: 科學與技術是了解這個世界和我們自己一項強而有力的工具，而許多作家們對於這樣的情況也在他們的作品中給予各式各樣的回應。在這個課程中我們將學習到作家們如何在他們的作品中使用文學藝術技巧來詮釋與解讀科技與現代文學的相互作用；人類與大自然的關係；以及人類當前的處境。修習這門課程的學生並不需要具備對科學有嚴格的基礎訓練與知識，只要具備強烈的好奇心和求知慾。在課程的一開始我們將藉由閱讀相關作品讓大家熟悉一些重要的議題。課程的中心主題除了針對科學技術與文學的相互關係外，我們也將焦點放在分析文學作品上。我們將繼續探索文學形式與內容的關聯。同時，我們也將利用現代科技在課堂上練習文學作品的即興創作。學生們一開始分析一段正文的內容。然後他們利用這些片段重新組合成一篇新的文本。接著，在這些文本內建立新的超連結︰每當文本被閱讀時，讀者能有多種選擇來閱讀並且使正文成為一個完全新的實體。
description.en: Science and technology are powerful modes of knowing about the world and ourselves, and the rich and varied responses of writers to these ways of knowing. The writers whose works we'll be looking at use art to question the ways that science and technology interact with and alter our understanding of the world, human nature and the human condition. People do not need a formal background in science to enjoy and excel in this course, just a lively intellectual curiosity. A few background essays will help you understand many of the scientific concepts and attitudes we will encounter in the literature we read. While the course does have a central thematic interest in science and technology, our main focus will always be on analyzing literature and its interaction with science and technology. We will continually ask how form, or the construction of a literary work, relates to content, or the meaning of a literary work. This means our main focus will be to analyze the techniques that writers

name.zh: 通俗小說與英語文教學

description.zh: 本課程是為在小學、國中、高中、與職業技術等學校之英語文教師教學需要而設計之英文課程。透過以暢銷書、犯罪小說、偵探小說、言情小說、科幻小說、驚悚小說、恐怖小說、與西部小說等通俗小說，作為大學以下各級英語文教學之主要或輔助教材，藉以提升學生口說、閱讀、寫作等表達能力。文學小說通常比較困難，通俗小說多以娛樂為主，因此比較易讀易懂。Elizabeth Lowell曾經說過：「好的通俗小說作者可以用普通語言創造不凡的意義，並且令耳熟能詳的故事蘊含新鮮而且令人興奮的內容。」的確，我們不應將通俗小說都鄙視成千篇一律、逃避現實的故事。一般人之所以受到通俗小說的吸引，主要是因為通俗小說故事內容與現實生活的各個層面幾乎息息相關。在本課程裡，我們將討論諸如Dan Brown's The Da Vinci Code, Harper Lee's To Kill a Mockingbird, Khaled Hosseini's The Kite Runner, Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice, John Grisham's The Firm, Michael Crichton's Jurassic Park, and Louis L'Amour's McQueen of the Tumbling K等通俗小說。修習本課程的學生亦可推薦對未來英語文教學有助益之教材，作為上課教材。
description.en: This course is designed for elementary school, junior high school, senior high school, and vocational and technical school English teachers who are interested in teaching and learning English through popular fiction that appears as the bestseller, crime fiction, detective fiction, popular romance, science fiction, thriller, horror, and Western, etc. While literary fiction tends to be difficult, popular fiction is usually entertaining and accessible. As Elizabeth Lowell has suggested, a good author of popular fiction can "make the common language uncommonly meaningful" and "make an often-told tale freshly exciting." Indeed, popular fiction cannot be scorned simply as "formulaic escapism" that has nothing to do with reality. People are attracted to popular fiction especially because of its relevance to almost every aspect of human life. In this course, we will discuss books such as Dan Brown's The Da Vinci Code, Harper Lee's To Kill a Mockingbird, Khaled Hosseini's The Kite Runner, Jane

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹下列內容：1.輻射度學基本參數介紹2.光度學基本參數介紹- 流明、燭光、勒克斯、尼特3.光的量測 - 總光功率量測、光強角分布、4.光譜量測、色溫量測、演色性量測5.TracePro軟體介紹6.Lightpipe導光管模擬7.LED配光曲線模擬範例8.LED混色照明設計實例9.室內照明標準 與 照明規畫10.道路照明 與 CIE道路照明標準
description.en: Outline：1.Radiometry 2.Photometry - lm, cd, lux, nit3.Light Measurement - Total flux, Intensity distribution, 4.Spectrum measurement -- CCT, CRI5.Luminaries Angular profile and design example6.Interior illumination standard7.CIE Road lighting standard8.Introduction to Dialux software 9.Case study:  LED Lighting Design Using TracePro10.Case study:  Road Lighting Design Using TracePro11.Case study:  LCD Backlight Lighting Design Using TracePro12.Case study:  Head Light Lighting Design Using TracePro

notes: 光電所和最後一哩合開,研究所限10人選修

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，國家特制定著作權法；本課程重心在於介紹我國著作權法之內涵，包含該法所保護之「著作」範圍、權利人及著作權範圍、著作權管理及權利侵害之救濟等，除講授理論外，同時搭配案例解析，以期讓同學對著作權法有最完整之了解。
description.en: Copyright Act is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. This course introduces the main meanings, concepts and contents of the Copyright Law. Including the scope for copyright protection, the kinds of works that qualify for copyright protection, the rights granted to copyright owners, the management of copyright, and remedies for right infringement. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展，國家特制定商標法，本課程以介紹我國商標法為重點，主要內容包括商標規範之基本原理、商標之構成要素、商標之分類方式及各類型商標之特性與功能、申請商標註冊之程序、商標註冊之審查及核准、商標權之取得及行使、異議程序及紛爭處理、權利侵害之救濟等。
description.en: Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and the consumers' interest, maintain fair competition of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce. This course is focusing on the introduction of Trademark Act. Topics will mainly include the basic principle of trademark standard, the integrant part of trademark, the characteristic and the function of trademark, the application procedures, examination and approval, acquisition of the trademark rights and exercises, the procedure of opposition and the dispute processes, remedies for right infringement and so on.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了(但不限於)人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

notes: 星期三A/B/C 限碩二 / 科研732教室

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 高等材料性質學與實習
name.en: Advanced Properties of Materials and Related Practice

description.zh: 本課程將深入的討論材料之光電及表面性質，並經由實習實驗量測各種相關特性。尤其是在材料電子理論的應用方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：電子理論、光學特性、繞射理論、表面科學、以及材料之磁性與熱力學性質。
description.en: After successfully completing this subject a student should be able to: (i) explain the fundamental aspects of electrical properties of materials, (ii) describe and understand energy method, (iii) describe and discuss nanoscale properties of materials, (iv) apply advanced properties of materials to engineering design problems, and (v) execute related measurements.

name.zh: 建築物耐震補強技術之探討
name.en: Technigue of Seismic Retrofit for Building

description.zh: 本課程將以建築設計、計畫的角度去探討、分析，地震中建築物實際破壞的狀況及原因。並對建築物耐震診斷之概念、方法及耐震補修、補強，設計原理、新工法（制震補強、隔震補強）等，做一詳細介紹與說明。
description.en: We try to study the real reason why the buildings were damaged by a earthquake,as far as architechural design is concerned. In addition,we clarify the coacepts and methods of techuique of seismic retrofit for building and provide the new techical soltions to seismic and vibration protection,such as vibration control and base isolation,etc.

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使同學透過對建築及不動產相關法律專題之討論，瞭解建築及不動產相關權益。課程主要講授涉及「建築」及「不動產」相關之法律規定及實務之運作等內容。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to enable the participants to understand construction and real estate related interests through discussing issues of construction and real estate law. The course is designed to introduce principles and practice of "construction" and "real estate" law and regulations, est.

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

name.zh: 創意城市與城市規劃專論
name.en: Special Topics on Creative City and City Planning

description.zh: 目前全世界超過一半以上的人口生活在城市，人數仍快速增加中，相伴而來的環境、經濟、社會與治理問題將如何處理？因此城市轉型是城市要繼續成長的必要過程，許多案例顯示創意城市是城市轉型的典範，可以作為城市轉型與再生的契機。創意城市是近年來先進國家鼓勵領導者、產業、市民從己身城市內思考、規劃、發揮創意與實現城市創新的觀念，以啟發城市找到自身的發展潛能，結合當地文化資產及地方特色，經由城市發展規劃提升創意經濟及城市的競爭力。本課程以文化創意、產業創新及城市規劃為主軸，包括研究創意城市定義、特徵、條件、構成、指標、類型、評估的基礎，進而探討與文化創意、產業創新、城市發展規劃的關連，並參考國內外城市的創新與再生案例，他們是如何在城市議題上思考、規劃與執行富有創意的行動，又如何將行動運用於城市規劃。課程經由互動分析創意城市與城市規劃的關連及作法，討論可供借鏡的發展策略與方案。
description.en: The creative city is crucial to urban transformation in the future of our city. It means to encourage leaders,industries, and citizens to think, plan, create and realize urban innovation, inspired by the city to find their own development potential, combined with local cultural assets and characteristics, to enhance the creative economy through urban development planning and the city's competitiveness. The course aims at framing cultural creativity, industrial innovation and urban planning as main thoughts on the basis of research. Literature review including definition, characteristics, conditions, indicators, types of assessment, and then to explore with the cases of innovation and regeneration around the world. How they think urban issues, planning and implementation on creative actions, and how the actions used in urban planning.Courses via interactive analysis among the creative city,urban planning and practices,to figure out development strategies and programs available to learn.

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

notes: 建都所和設計博所合開

description.zh: 本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：1.	建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。2.	學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。3.	以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。4.	以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 1.機率簡介 2.機率分佈 3.統計概論 4.抽樣分析 5.參數估計 6.區間估計 7.假設檢定 8.迴歸分佈 9.統計品管 10.變異分析
description.en: Introduction to probability Probability distribution Introduction to statistics Sampling analysis Quality control

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

name.zh: 產業科技管理專題研究
name.en: Special Topics in Industrial Technology management

description.zh: 1.增進並充實同學對科技產業之認識 2.瞭解高科技公司生存之道-創新策略與管理 3.培養高科技公司經理人才
description.en: 1.Provide and enhance the knowlege of Science & Technolegy enterprise 2.Understand the rule of success of high tech. Company-Innovation Strategy and management 3.Cultivate high tech.Company manager

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 年來，在世博和花博兩大活動的帶動下，讓跨領域整合的「展示科技」成為新的研究焦點；新型態的展示手法，可以被應用在博物館及展場、商業空間、互動式機台、行銷活動和數位藝術。依照需求的不同，可以把展示科技分成『會場環境』和『觀眾體驗』兩類，前者就像是基礎建設、活動系統和周邊系統，而後者則是為觀眾創造全新體驗。而本課程則是為了掌握產業界相關的技術新知、學術界的專業研究與藝文界的脈動，本課程將廣邀展示科技的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就展場設計、互動技術、視覺呈現等面向，翻轉你與展示物的關係，體現創意展現的軟實力。
description.en: The promotion of Expo and Flora Expo in recent years makes the display technology a new focus in study. New pattern of display techniques can be applied to museum, exhibition, commercial space, interactive machinery, marketing and digital art. Depending on different needs, the Display Technology can be divided into two categories, which are "the environment of exhibition" and "the experience of audience". The former is like fundamental constructions, movable system, and peripheral system; the latter is like building a new and fresh experience for the audience. To understand science and technological information from business field, researches from academic field and issues from arts field, this course should be invited the expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion.

description.zh: 本課程提供供應鏈中協同管理的重要多面向，探討供應商、零售商及終端消費者間腳色互動及運作，以及能促使供應鏈鄭和及協同之機制。課程目標在使(1) 在現今高度競合產業環境中，提供對整合及協同供應鏈的理解、專業管理及未來願景。(2) 提供學生具高階供應鏈管理者之必要認知及知識。
description.en: The course takes a broad view of the critical facets of supply chain coordination and management, expanding beyond internal company operations to include the suppliers, the retailers and the end consumers. Aligning supply chain management with integrated strategies and policies. The goal of the course is (a) to provide professionals with the vision and skill set necessary to understand and manage the integration and coordination of activities within today's increasingly complicated supply chains and (b) to equip students with the knowledge and perceptions demanded for supply chain management leaders today.

description.zh: 應用語言學屬於邊緣交叉學科，與其他學科如語言學、心理學、教育學、人類學與社會學之間存在密切的關係。本課程著重在介紹第二語言與外語習得、第二語言與外語教學法、言談分析與社會語用學及社會文化學理論的研究，並探討這些領域與語言教學與學習之間的關連。本課程涵蓋各種不同觀點的理論與應用，回顧方法論的演進歷史，尤其強調現今廣受認同的方法論。
description.en: Applied linguistics is a large interdisciplinary field of study related to a range of academic fields, including linguistics, psychology, education, anthropology, and sociology. This course focuses primarily on research in the areas of second/foreign language acquisition, second/foreign language pedagogy, discourse analysis, and sociopragmatic and sociocultural theory, as well as their relevance to language teaching and learning. We will cover theories and applications from a variety of perspectives, tracing the history of methodologies with special emphasis on those currently in widespread use.

description.zh: 針對大學所習之廣義生產管理再作深入的闡述，一方面做公開的個案分析研討，以收進一步的學習之效，同時要求學生做實務專題研究
description.en: Production and operation management,case study and analysis,and independent study.

notes: 工管所和IMBA合開;工管所為選修,IMBA為必修

name.zh: 醫療器材智慧財產權工程
name.en: Intellectual properties engineering on medical devices

description.zh: 本課程目的在使學生了解智慧財產權在醫療器材領域之應用，尤其是專利之佈局，課程中會介紹產業發展趨勢與專利之關係。利用專利資訊進行產品設計與創新工程，也是學習之重點，醫療器材專利價值評估與其管理，亦為本課程之相關內容。
description.en: Course purpose:1. To describe how to use intellectual properties in medical device field2. To use patent information on medical device designs and to do the designing around3. To know patent value and IP managementTo understand how the medical device industry related to IP portfolio

name.zh: 人類聚落與風土建築專題
name.en: Seminar on Human Settlements and Vernacular Architecture

description.zh: 本課程將以「人造環境視為實相的再現」的研究範式為基礎，帶領學生以比較研究的觀點，進行跨地域與跨文化的人類聚落與風土建築之討論。世界各地的聚落與風土建築案例將從各種自然因素進行分析，例如氣候、地景、材料與構造等等；此外，其亦將從人類對於外在環境之心靈建構進行分析，包括「世界軸與宇宙十字」、「納入與排除的結構」與「聖域與非聖域」。透過這樣的分析，學生將可以理解人類聚落與風土建築的根本價值，這些價值也將必須落實在創造人類永續居住環境的過程中。
description.en: This course will teach students how to conduct inter-regional and inter-cultural research on the worldwide human settlements and vernacular architecture from a comparative perspective as based on the paradigm of the built environment as a representation of realities. Various examples of human settlements and vernacular architecture will be analyzed not only according to the natural factors (e.g. climate, landscape, material and tectonics) but also according to the mental constructs of the external environment (e.g. the "Axis Mundi & Cosmic Cross", the "Including & Excluding Structures" and the "Holy & Unholy Zones"). Such an analysis will enable students to understand the intrinsic values of human settlements and vernacular architecture that should be embodied in the establishment of a sustainable built environment for human beings.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

name.zh: 公共建築與空間的服務設計
name.en: Service Design for Public Buildings and Space

description.zh: 探討身為設計師針對公共建築與空間的服務設計應有的素養與責任，研究台灣與其他地方相關公共建築與所提供的服務空間案例。
description.en: If you could improve one everyday experience in Taipei City, what would it be, and how would you do it?In this class, we ask: What's a service and how are good ones conceived and created? What can we, as designers, contribute to services for public buildings and space? What responsibilities do users as "citizens" rather than "customers" demand of designers? Drawing from my own interest in, research for, and links to,Taipei City agencies and service providers, we'll explore the kinds of relationships that services broker, and practice some key design processes and methods to understand how context of use, stakeholders, storytelling and mapping techniques shape services. In class and through assignments, we'll review a range of real life case studies in Taiwan and elsewhere.The class will be part seminar and part workshop. It's not a production class; instead, assignments will focus on written and sketching exercises, and reading. There will be opportunities to present, and, where succes

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Innovative Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.zh: 本課程為線性系統之進階課程, 主要為碩士班以上之學生而設計。本課程之主要目的在對多輸入多輸出(MIMO)系統做深入之探討，內容包括MIMO系統之描述、特性分析及控制器設計。
description.en: This is an advanced course to linear system theory, and is designed mainly for graduate students. The objective of this course is to let one have an extensive study to the behaviors of multivariable systems. In this course, we will introduce various methods of describing MIMO linear systems as well as ways of analyzing some of their properties. Controller design procedures are also introduced in the course.

description.zh: 介紹人機互動之研究、規劃和設計。本課程運用認知心理學與心智模型相關理論來解釋電腦介面使用者之環境知覺與互動，藉此得以改善人機互動之品質與效率。
description.en: An introduction to the study, planning, and design of the interaction between users and computers. This course aims to study user's intuitive perception about their own acts and their surrounding world by employing knowledge of cognitive psychology and mental model that help shape behavior and set an approach to solving problems in design. The basic goal of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) is to improve the usability of computer interface to the user's needs. Topics include: (1) designing the best possible interface within given constraints; (2) optimization for a desired property of usability; (3) development of new interfaces and interaction techniques; (4) evaluation and comparing interfaces.

description.zh: 簡介、數位影像處理的基礎、影像的轉換、影像的增強、影像的復原、影像的壓縮、影像分割、影像的表達及描述、自動車導航及醫學影像的處理和應用、論文討論。
description.en: Introduction, Window operation System, API, DDL, Design of DDE and OLE, Structure of Client/Server System, Multimedia, Image Compression, Graphic supervisory/control system.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將探討語音訊號的相關的各種基礎知識與處理技術，包括語音辨認，語音合成與口語對話系統等，並將檢視數個具目前最先進技術的系統，使學生能建立語音信號處理技術之基本知識及能力。課程內容包括：*語音的產生，語音訊號聲學特性與語音知覺的原理*語音分析*語音辨識*語音合成*口語對話系統*目前最先進技術系統*相關進階議題
description.en: In this course, we will introduce fundamental speech signal processing techniques, including speech recognition, speech synthesis and spoken dialogue system and examine some state-of-the-art systems.Content:*Overview of Speech Processing Techniques*Speech Production, Acoustic Phonetics and Psychoacoustic Phenomena*Speech Analysis*Speech Recognition*Speech Synthesis*Spoken Dialog System*State-of-the-Art Systems*Selected Advanced Topics

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: (1)簡述行動無線通訊，(2)無線網際網路與WLAN，(3)行動隨意式網路（MANET），(4)MANET：MAC層協約，(5)MANET：多重路由協約，(6)MANET：服務品質，(7)MANET：安全協約，(8)MANET：電能管哩，(9)無線感測網路，(10)混合式無線網路，(11)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1)Introduction to Mobile Wireless Communications,(2)Wireless Internet and LANs,(3)Mobile Ad Hoc Wireless Networks (MANET),(4)MAC Protocols for MANET,(5)Multiple Routing in MANET,(6)QoS in MANET,(7)Security Protocols for MANET,(8)Energy Management in MANET,(9)Wireless Sensor Networks,(10)Hybrid Wireless Networks(11)	Recent Advances and Research Issues.

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

name.zh: 互動式娛樂服務之音訊處理技術
name.en: Audio Signal Processing for Interactive Entertainment Services

description.zh: 本課程講述音訊處理技術之理論與實務，並著重於互動式娛樂服務之應用。理論部分包括聲音訊號的分析與辨識、電子音樂的產生、內涵式音樂檢索原理、以及空間音場等問題介紹。透過實際應用的探討，使學生獲得理論知識與設計創意。實務部分則以卡拉OK服務平台為核心，於課後作業及期末專題實作中，藉由軟體模擬、DSP開發平台、與手持行動裝置的程式設計，使學生應用電子音樂技術、音樂檢索技術、與空間音場原理來實現一卡拉OK系統，突破一般居家或手持行動裝置的功能限制，提升歌唱情境。
description.en: The course is designed to equip students with knowledge and skills in audio signal processing, particularly in the applications of interactive entertainment services. It covers both theory and practice of audio signal analysis and recognition, electronic music production, content-based music retrieval, and spatial audio effects. Through the use of personal computers, DSP platforms, and handheld devices, students will learn to apply the audio signal processing techniques to the design of interactive karaoke services.

description.zh: 1.MOS元件工作模式及MOSFET原理 2.微小MOSFET的額外考慮 3.矽晶圓的生長 4.擴 散 5.離子植入 6.氧化處理 7.CVD技術 8.微影術 9.蒸鍍與濺鍍 10.光罩製作 11.CMOS IC製程
description.en: 1. Operating modes and theory of MOS devices. 2. Small-geometry effects. 3. Wafer growth. 4. Diffusion. 5. Ion implantation. 6. Oxidation. 7. CVD techniques. 8. Lithography. 9. Sputtering and evaporation. 10. Photo masking. 11. CMOS IC fabrication processing.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 本課程以微波電路組件與平面型天線為兩大主軸，深入介紹各個議題如何分析、設計、製作與量測，並著重於它在新一代無線通訊系統中扮演的角色與應用。中文概述1.微帶線電路特性2.共面波導電路特性3.共面帶線電路特性4.各式傳輸線結構之轉接5.新式平面型電路組件6.高頻電路量測技術7.微帶天線設計8.寬頻天線設計9.天線陣列設計10.天線參數量測
description.en: 1.Characteristics of Microstrip Line Circuits2.Characteristics of Coplanar Waveguide Circuits3.Characteristics of Coplanar Stripline Circuits4.Transitions for Different Transmission Line Structures5.Novel Planar Circuit Components6.Techniques of High-Frequency Circuit Measurement7.Microstrip Antenna Design8.Broadband Antenna Design9.Planar Antenna Array Design10.Techniques of Antenna Parameters Measurement

notes: 電通所和職電通所合開

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.多頻帶射頻接收機架構及鏈路預算2.多頻帶射頻接收機電路設計3.多頻帶射頻發射機架構及鏈路預算4.多頻帶射頻發射機電路設計5.多頻帶壓控振盪器與鎖相迴路設計學生能從這門課學習到多頻射頻收發系統的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.Architecture, Link Budget, and Circuit Design of Multi-band RF Receiver 2.Architecture, Link Budget, and Circuit Design of Multi-band RF Transmitter3.Design of Multi-band VCOs and PLLThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of multi-band RF transceiver system from this course.

description.zh: 1.導論2.無失真壓縮技術3.量化與轉換編碼4.動作估計與動作補償5.MPEG視訊編碼標準6.視訊編碼在傳輸時的考量7.無線傳播通道8.無線通訊系統之數位調變技術9.無線通訊系統之通道編碼技術10.多重路徑衰落通道之應對技術11.無線多媒體通訊系統與標準
description.en: 1.Introductions 2.Entropy coding 3.Rate-distortion theory and quantization 4.Motion compensation and Interframe coding5.MPEG video coding 6.Multimedia transmission 7.Wireless propagation channels 8.Digital modulation in wireless systems 9.Channel coding in wireless systems 10.Schemes to overcome multipath fading 11.Standards of wireless multimedia communication systems

description.zh: (1)簡述行動無線通訊，(2)無線網際網路與WLAN，(3)行動隨意式網路（MANET），(4)MANET：MAC層協約，(5)MANET：多重路由協約，(6)MANET：服務品質，(7)MANET：安全協約，(8)MANET：電能管哩，(9)無線感測網路，(10)混合式無線網路，(11)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1)Introduction to Mobile Wireless Communications,(2)Wireless Internet and LANs,(3)Mobile Ad Hoc Wireless Networks (MANET),(4)MAC Protocols for MANET,(5)Multiple Routing in MANET,(6)QoS in MANET,(7)Security Protocols for MANET,(8)Energy Management in MANET,(9)Wireless Sensor Networks,(10)Hybrid Wireless Networks(11)	Recent Advances and Research Issues.

name.zh: 電腦輔助積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程將給予學習者充分瞭解現代体電路設計技術如何產生矽晶片與應用在各種複雜電子系統上.課程內容如下所述:1.系統設計流程2.MOS電晶体理論3.IC制程技術4.電路效能評估5.CMOS電路與邏輯設計6.副系統設計7.期末專題計劃
description.en: The course dims to give an understanding of how integrated circuit technology is used today to implement complex electronic systems as silicon chips.Content in the course are:1.System Design Flow 2.MOS Transistor Theory3.Fnbrcation Process Technology4.Performance Estimation 5.CMOS circuit and Logic Designs6.Subsystem Design 7.Final Project

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程以微波電路組件與平面型天線為兩大主軸，深入介紹各個議題如何分析、設計、製作與量測，並著重於它在新一代無線通訊系統中扮演的角色與應用。中文概述1.微帶線電路特性2.共面波導電路特性3.共面帶線電路特性4.各式傳輸線結構之轉接5.新式平面型電路組件6.高頻電路量測技術7.微帶天線設計8.寬頻天線設計9.天線陣列設計10.天線參數量測
description.en: 1.Characteristics of Microstrip Line Circuits2.Characteristics of Coplanar Waveguide Circuits3.Characteristics of Coplanar Stripline Circuits4.Transitions for Different Transmission Line Structures5.Novel Planar Circuit Components6.Techniques of High-Frequency Circuit Measurement7.Microstrip Antenna Design8.Broadband Antenna Design9.Planar Antenna Array Design10.Techniques of Antenna Parameters Measurement

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

name.zh: 高解析度攝影機設計與應用
name.en: Design and Applications of High Resolution Camera

description.zh: 高解析度攝影機設計導論與應用，此課程包含感測器的各種基礎特性探討、類比與數位訊號處理、與其應用討論。本課程目的在給予學習者了解高解析度攝影機設計導論與應用，並強調與結合基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1 CCD/CMOS感測器的介紹、2 影像感測器的特性、3 彩色影像技術的介紹、4 前端處理(AFE)的感測器原始資料、5 數位影像訊號處理(ISP)、6 評估DSP和FPGA硬體平台、7 影像品質評估、8 醫學影像系統的應用、9 全高畫質網路攝影機的應用、與10機器視覺的應用。
description.en: This course is concerned with the design and applications of high resolution camera, which includes the basic various characteristics of image sensors, analog and digital processes, and some applications of high resolution camera. Its purpose is to deal with the design and applications of high resolution camera, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1 Introduction to CCD/CMOS Sensors, 2 The Characteristics of Image Sensors, 3 Introduction of Color Image Sciences, 4 Sensor Raw Data of Analog Front End Processing (AFE), 5 Digital Image Signal Processing (ISP), 6 Evaluation of DSP and FPGA Hardware Platforms, 7 Image Quality Evaluation, 8 Applications of Medical Image System, 9 Applications of Full-High-Definition IP-Camera, and 10 Machine Vision Applications.

notes: 電通所和職電通所合開

description.zh: 1.寬頻和超寬頻通道模型 2.CDMA 3.多使用者偵測4.MIMO 5.時空傳輸技術 6.標準中其他無線傳輸技術
description.en: 1.wideband and ultrawideband channel modeling2.code-division multiple access (CDMA)3.multiuser detection4.multiple-input multiple output (MIMO)5.spatial multiplexing/space-time coding and in between6.other transmission technology in standards: OFDMA, UWB, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

notes: 電通所和職電通所合開

description.zh: 進階微控制器硬體架構與操作原理，程式語言介紹，數位及類比系統訊號感測與控制，通訊介面程式設計，韌體設計與專題實作。
description.en: Hardware structure and operating principles of micro-controllers, programming language, digital/analog signal sensing and control, communication protocols, firmware design and hands-on project.

description.zh: 本課程介紹公司管理者在作財務決策時，會產生心理偏誤，進而做出不適當的財務決策。另外，本課程也提供管理者如何避免心理偏誤，並改善其財務決策程序。本課程以心理學的角度來探討公司理財的決策。
description.en: This course introduces how psychological biases affect managers' financial decision making processes. The psychological biases include excessive optimism, overconfidence, confirmation bias, illusion of control, representativeness, availability bias, anchoring, framing, loss aversion…etc.

description.zh: 在需要分析大量資料數據的眾多研究領域，資料數據可視化技術扮演舉足輕重的角色。本課包含下列研究主題：資料模型與影像模型、視覺感知與認知、資料可視化步驟過程處理、空間感知與空間資料顯示、色彩使用與原理、使用解介面設計、互動模式、資料瀏覽與引導找尋、多變數多維度資料、樹狀與圖示、層級架構展現、複雜關係呈現、視覺化設計評估。
description.en: Data visualization plays an important role in a variety of study fields. This course includes the following topics: Data and Image Models, Visual Perception and Cognition, Process of Data Visualization, Space Perception and Display of Data in Space, Purpose of Color and Principles of Using Color in Visualization and UI Design, Interaction Models, Browsing and Navigation, Multivariate and Multidimensional Data, Trees and Graphs for Representing Hierarchies and Complex Relations, Evaluation of Visualization Design.

notes: 四資四和資工所合開,明珠講座馬匡六教授合開

description.zh: 在人類文明發展的進程上，曾經不斷地擴張其生存領域，並且在掠奪來的領土或是無人居住的地區興建過全新的城市，這些新興的城市，可能被稱為計畫城市或是殖民城市，與自然生成並且具備風土性格的城市在其空間屬性上有著極大的差異，因而殖民城市研究也有這完全不同的論述方法，在其建築的相關討論上亦然。為了更清楚地瞭解今日我們所存在的世界以及其空間環境，本課程將針對十五世紀以後大航海時期歐洲人進入到非洲、美洲、亞洲海域及陸地，開始了殖民地的新生活，並且開始了以殖民為主要需求的城市規劃，同時投射了其心中的理想城市，以及在歷史過程中的整體實踐，並帶入歐洲的建築思考與營建文明，本課程將探討相關城市與建築的現象。
description.en: In the Human History, we see people struggling for expansion of their living space, desiring of more natural resources.  They took some land, made their own territories, and built their own town, becoming cities.  One might call them ? Planned cities ? or ? colonial cities ?.  Those towns or cities, are totally different in their nature from the towns formed.  Therefore, studies on those cities ought to have some different discourses on them.This seminar will be focus on the phenomena since the epoch of Great Discovery, the coming of European to America, Africa and Asia.  Europeans at time, how they adapted their new life in the colonies, and the founding of new ideal city in their colonies.  The architectural urban phenomena will be the subject of this seminar.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

notes: 建都所和永續建築所合開

description.zh: 專題討論照明與視覺心理等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出見解。課程內容包括永續發展之綠色照明、照明與色彩、眩光之評價、光源之新發展、燈具之美、高齡者之照明環境、防災照明、視覺與輝度分布、照明耗能評估指標與基準、晝光利用、照明之控制、道路照明與安全、戶外照明與都市環境、光污染等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting and visual psychology that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including green lighting for sustainable development, lighting and color, the evaluation of glare, the new tendency of lighting source, the beauty of luminair, lighting for venerable age, lighting for fire control, visual and luminance distribution, evaluation index and base of lighting energy, the advantage of daylight, lighting control, road lighting and safety, outdoor lighting and urban environment, lighting pollution.

name.zh: 創業講座-網路行銷與創業

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: 四管三、經管所和最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養-新興市場新契機
name.en: Feast for the global perspective -Opportunities in Emerging Markets

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、衡量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposa

notes: 博士班課程，碩班學生欲選修須經授課教師同意

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為建立同學計量分析的基礎，介紹並應用計量方法於各種研究議題、訓練同學實際操作電腦應用軟體從事實證分析、引導同學尋找適合實證分析的研究主題。課程內容包介紹常用之計量分析方法如線性規劃與回歸分析等數學估計方法，應用於實際問題之中，並同時訓練學生將學習如何利用電腦套裝軟體來協助分析與解決問題，來提高分析效率。
description.en: This purpose of Quantitative Analysis Methods is to train and strength the data analysis ability of students. The real case study and package will be involved in class. The Linear Programming, Regression analysis and mathematical models methods will be also discussed in a series case applications for increasing the analytical effectiveness.

notes: 博士班課程，碩班學生欲選修須經授課教師同意

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性的相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。
description.en: The topics of this course include interactivity, and virtual experience, virtual community, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

name.zh: 管理心理學與溝通策略

description.zh: 管理心理旨在探討組織中人與事的問題；從對人員的動機、認知、學習、態度等得個別行動差異之研究，到團體行為與效能之探討，藉以促進組織發展，提昇管理績效。探討之內容包括：態度、工作滿足、性格、知覺、激勵、學習、領導、溝通、權力、衝突、組織文化、組織結構、團體動力學等。從企業經理人的觀點來探討溝通的有關問題，旨在提供學生對溝通知識的了解，並熟悉溝通的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋溝通的本質與觀念性架構，溝通的理論與模型，溝通的規劃、執行與控制，溝通的策略與技能。
description.en: The objective of course is probe into question of people and something of organization. Research about difference in motives, senses, learning and attitude of people. To probe into behavior and efficacy of group. To advance developing of organization and manage performance. It includes attitude, satisfy job, character, encourage, learning, leadership, communication, power, conflict, culture and structure of organization, power of group. The course discuss about the communication issue from business manager. It introduces the concepts of communication and the practice about communication. The core of the course include the knowledge of communication and structure、theory and models.

description.zh: 本課程主要提供全校學生與實務界交流的平台，透過邀請知名產、官、學界專家，進行專題演講，藉此讓學生瞭解創意發想的過程以及申請專利的流程。
description.en: This course provides students a platform for interacting with current industry, through giving speeches from different field of experts. Inspire students through sharing creative ideas and know-how of patent application from different fields of expert.

notes: 四設二三四.創新所和最後一哩合開

name.zh: 大型主機作業系統技術與實務
name.en: Introduction to Mainframe Operating System Technologies and Practices

description.zh: 本課程目的為教授大型主機之觀念、技術、系統運作、與運作實務。授課大綱如下: 1. 大型主機系統應用概述 2. 大型主機硬體架構介紹 3. 作業系統z/OS介紹 4. z/OS交談式介面 5. 檔案系統之使用 6. 作業控制語言(Job Control Language)介紹 7. 批次作業之處理 8. 大型主機應用系統開發概述 9. 大型主機程式語言介紹 10. 程式編譯與執行本課程含課堂講授與上機實習。
description.en: This course is designed to help students understanding mainframe concept, technologies, and system operation. The agenda covers : 1. Introduction to the mainframe system 2. The Hardware Systems 3. 4. Introduction to operating system z/OS 4. Interactive facility of z/OS : TSO/E, ISPF 5. Working with Data sets 6. Using Job Control Language and SDSF 7. Batch Processing 8. Designing and developing applications for z/OS 9. Using programming languages on z/OS 10. Compiling and Link-editing a program on z/OSCourse covers class lecture and Lab exercise using remote mainframe facilities.

notes: 資工系335實驗室，四資四和資工所合開

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.zh: 個人化智慧型捷運車輛與運作系統
name.en: Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System

description.zh: 本課程將未來個人化智慧型捷運車輛科技發展如何面對都市化人口集中、高車輛密度所造成之環境衝擊，能源短缺之節能需求，個人差異化之個人便捷智慧化車輛之需求，及與未來都會新交通網結合之最後一哩路之未來車發展之動向。課程中將以系統、組件、基礎學理介紹未來車之整車發展趨勢、動力種類及性能的追求方向、輕量化結構之材料創新、新能源之應用與系統管理科技之發展。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle" and the "Operation System". And it will drive to focus on the future vehicle technology development to face the challenges on the environmental impacts from the growth of the crowed mega cities, on the energy saving due to the shortage of the foil fuel, on the differentiation and ICT innovation from the young people, and on the metropolitan last-mile transportation solution to link with the public transportation system.This course contains numerous fundamental domain knowledge and technologies including vehicle system, powertrain module, energy module, lightweight chassis, environmental policy, infrastructure planning and innovative business model investigation, etc. Students will learn the fundamental knowledge of the future "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System" development.

notes: 車輛所和職車輛所合開

name.zh: 個人化智慧型捷運車輛與運作系統
name.en: Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System

description.zh: 本課程將未來個人化智慧型捷運車輛科技發展如何面對都市化人口集中、高車輛密度所造成之環境衝擊，能源短缺之節能需求，個人差異化之個人便捷智慧化車輛之需求，及與未來都會新交通網結合之最後一哩路之未來車發展之動向。課程中將以系統、組件、基礎學理介紹未來車之整車發展趨勢、動力種類及性能的追求方向、輕量化結構之材料創新、新能源之應用與系統管理科技之發展。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle" and the "Operation System". And it will drive to focus on the future vehicle technology development to face the challenges on the environmental impacts from the growth of the crowed mega cities, on the energy saving due to the shortage of the foil fuel, on the differentiation and ICT innovation from the young people, and on the metropolitan last-mile transportation solution to link with the public transportation system.This course contains numerous fundamental domain knowledge and technologies including vehicle system, powertrain module, energy module, lightweight chassis, environmental policy, infrastructure planning and innovative business model investigation, etc. Students will learn the fundamental knowledge of the future "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System" development.

notes: 車輛所和職車輛所合開

name.zh: 品牌領導公司整合型產品開發
name.en: Branded Company's Integrated Product Development: Advantech IPD

description.zh: 課程藉由研華公司的實務經驗，來協助同學了解業界實際的產品開發流程與公司運作實務，課程內容將包括市場定位、市場分析、產品規劃、產品設計、專案進行、製造、行銷、銷售、客戶服務等。本課程將提供同學對於產品開發過程與產品生命週期的全盤學習過程，同學亦可藉此了解一個跨國企業的實際運作情形。授課內容並搭配實案例的分享與專案演練，來引導學生結合學術理論基礎及業界實務操作，以協助同學未來於職場工作無縫銜接。
description.en: This lecture will try to help students learn more about technology product development and actual enterprise operating processes through Advantech's vast industrial experience which includes market research & analysis, product planning & design, manufacturing, and customer services. From this lecture students will not only get a better understanding of how a global enterprise operates, but also gain a clearer idea of how a newly developed product is developed by looking at its product life cycle. Practical cases will also be shared so as to describe and compare the methodology with the real experience. Through a better understanding of a global enterprise's operation, it is hoped this knowledge will enlighten participants and speed up their progress in their future career path.

notes: 和最後一哩合開,限電資及機電學院各系所60人

name.en: Design of switching mode power supply

description.zh: 1.簡介2.功率級電路3.轉換器架構與分析4.控制電路5.回授電路6.保護電路7.電路佈局與機構8.應用電路分析
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Power Stage Circuit3.Converter Topology4.Control Circuit5.Feedback Circuit6.Circuit Protection7.Circuit Layout and Machanism8.Application Circuit

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

name.zh: 就業達人講座-職前大補帖

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生對就業職場的認識，開設「就業達人講座-職前大補帖」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享勞工權益、面試、印象管理、職場生涯規劃等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步強化學生的就業競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students to familiarize the requirement of the current employment , strengthening their competitive ability in future. The course contents include the labors' rights, interview methods, impressed management and the planning of the career life,etc. By the topics, it is hopeful to assist students in comprehending the cognition of the employment of the employment for all kinds of industries.

notes: 四光四、光電所和最後一哩合開,周三ABC節上課

name.zh: 精彩創新-華碩追尋無與倫比系列

description.zh: 本課程將從理論與實務的角度與同學分享: 華碩致力於提供每位客戶最佳3C解決方案，以追尋無與倫比為目標，探究未來使用情境，結合深厚的研發實力與工藝設計，打造創新產品，並透過專業行銷，提升華碩品牌的心佔率與市佔率。
description.en: Inspiring Innovation o Persistent Perfection (IIPP) is the ASUS brand promise. During this lecture, The senior managers from ASUS would like to share with students: ASUS commits itself to providing the best 3C solutions to all users. With focus on understanding the needs of people and the strong R&D, design and marketing capabilities, ASUS hopes to garner mindshare as well as market share.

notes: 四光四、光電所和最後一哩合開,周二ABC節上課

name.zh: 國際觀培養:印尼文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Indonesian

description.zh: 為了迎接全球化的亞洲國家與東南亞國家之間的經濟發展,藉由傳授印尼語言,讓學生掌握印尼語同時也了解印尼文化作為兩國的經濟橋樑，以此來協助學生前往印尼就業。本課程是培養學生的溝通能力，以運用印尼語來跟印尼母語者打招呼、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to teach Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) and equip students not only with the language but also to understand the culture as an economic bridge between the two countries. And, it is hoped that assisting students in employment in Indonesia.This course will aim to help students to develop communication skills by utilizing Indonesian language to speak to native speakers in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, and descriptive usage…etc.

notes: 四光四.光電所合開,10月3日開始上課,三789節上課

name.zh: 國合專論:論文研究之策略與實務
name.en: International Colloquy on Special Topic: Strategy and Practice of Scientific Writing

description.zh: 本課程安排國際大師之講課，讓學生學習研究規劃至論文撰寫之策略與實務經驗分享，內容包括:(1)	論文研究之問題探索(2)	實驗方法與策略(3)	實驗結果與研究結論之連結(4)	期刊論文撰寫實務經驗
description.en: An international expert is invited to give the lectures. This course will provide important information regarding to the strategies and practical examples of scientific research. The curriculum include:(1)	Problem definition of the research(2)	Strategy of the experimental methods(3)	Relationship between experimental results and conclusions(4)	Practical aspects of scientific paper writing and submission

notes: Karlis Agris Gross 教授特別講座;11/5~16上課全英語

description.zh: 1.創造力與創意設計2.創造力培養與激發3.創意團隊的組成與分工4.創意設計技法5.機械工程之創意工程設計方法6.半導體與光電設備發明案例7.專利的申請與保護
description.en: 1.Creativity and creative design. 2. Creativity develops and stimulation. 3.Creative team works. 4. Methodology for creativity design. 5.Creative design in mechanical engineering. 6.Example of creative design in semiconductor and Electro-Optical equipment design. 7.Patents claim and protection.

description.en: Introduction to probability Probability distribution Introduction to statistics Sampling analysis Quality control

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 有限元素法在大地工程之應用
name.en: Finite Element Method in Geotechnical Engineering

description.zh: 有限元素法常被用來模擬基礎施工、開控支撐及山坡地開控的過程，預估土壤或岩盤的變形行為，研判或分析施工的安全性。本課程的內容除了講授有限元素法的基本理論，尚須以大地工程的案例作為實際推導公式理論之演練。其案例包括滲流問題、壓密沉陷問題及土石結構穩定分析等等。
description.en: Finite element method ha been widely used to simulae the process of foundation construction, cut and bracing and excavation etc, and to predict and analyze the construction safety. This course should include the basic theory and sfiffues matrix formulation, in addition, geotechnical engineering problem are in addition, geotechical engineering problems are used to help students to understand the basic theory and code formulation. These examle problems includes seepage, consolidation and earth structure stability analyses.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將針對如何從土壤動力試驗評估土壤的動態力學參考數導入,作為理論解或者數值解的輸入值,以預測土壤在震動下的變形行為,以及分析土壤與結構物的動態互制行為.內容包括:波傳遞理論,土壤的動力性質,土壤的液化,基礎的振動問題,等等..
description.en: This course will teach how to evaluate the soil's dynamic material properties by means of dynamic laboratory testing.Based on the analytical and numerical solution,the behaviour of soil-structure dynamic interaction can be predicted.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 1.混凝土之力學行為 2.鋼筋混凝土構件之力學行為含彎短,剪力,軸力,扭矩及共同作用時之行為.桁架理論,版之降優線理論. 3.規範之說明,應用與比較.
description.en: Studies of actual member behavior;members in flexure,combined flexure,shear,and torsion;bond and anchorage;combined axial load and flexure;slender columns;deep beams;derivation of current code provisions.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems.This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

name.en: Security and management of underground space

description.zh: 隨著人口的增加以及集中都市化的演進，利用地下空間已經是必然的趨勢，居住、商場、倉儲、交通、導排水等等，非但數量激增，甚且規模亦趨龐大。而地下空間因自然條件與進出、通路所限，無論維護、安全或管理都異於地面上的開放空間。台灣近年來的急遽發展，各類地下空間也急速增長，安全維護管理面更因人權的要求而益受關注。本課程即為因應此趨勢，而從地下空間的特異性開始，再以災害案例引入，尤其是以不確定性最高的公路隧道的火災消防搶救為主，整合土木、機電、營管、安全等不同領域知識，以貫串整學期的課程。內容簡述如下：一.地下空間之分類二.火災案例三.通風、照明系統簡介四.監控系統五.消防系統六.安全維護管理制度七.消防搶救本課程的目標在提供學生認知工程技術與營運管理及消防領域間整合性介面，引導學生從規劃設計階段即應思考人性化營運管理思維，成為全方位之未來工程師。
description.en: As the increasing number of population are living in the big cities, housing, shopping malls, warehousing, transportation, water supply and drainage are growing rapidly both in the number and the scale.  Therefore, the use of underground space is an inevitable trend.   Due to natural conditions and limited access of underground space, maintenance, security and management of underground space are quite different from those of open space on the ground.  With Taiwan's rapid development in recent years, various types of underground space are sprawling. Security, maintenance and management of underground space are of concern to us all. The course for this semester begins with exploring  the uniqueness of underground space, then studying several disaster cases focusing on the fire rescue for road tunnels and ends with integrating different areas of knowledge such as civil engineering, mechanical engineering, management and tunnel safety.

description.zh: 進階職場專業英文針對本校碩博士生設計系列最後一哩之實務專業課程。課程內容以英語全球溝通為主軸，強化商業寫作、簡報、會議及談判等技巧及能力。
description.en: The course provides essential and pragmatic English language used in real workplace. As it is designed for postgraduate students, the course also takes into account students’ academic studies as well as centers on students’ future career prospects. Students are expected to practice and refine their English communication skills, in particular correspondence writing and speaking. In that vein, students will be required to compose business correspondence, such as letters, emails and memos, and also to perform in simulated meetings and to brief progress report in English.

notes: 限30人,本課程不計入工商博班畢業學分

name.zh: 合金狀態的基礎與材料設計
name.en: The foundation of alloy and materials design

description.zh: 相圖是材料的索引，對於長期設計及材料的瞭解非常重要。本課程是根據熱力學及固態理論，循序漸進來瞭解二元相圖。 並舉例來顯示相圖是如何應用在冶金學和材料料學上。
description.en: Phase diagrams are the maps of materials, which have been being important in designing and understanding materials for a long time. The lecture is organized to understand binary phase diagrams on the basis of thermodynamics and solidification theory.  Moreover, a number of examples will be given to show how phase diagrams are useful in metallurgy and materials science.

notes: 上課時間：101年11月3日至8日每日上午9-12時
